ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: I am 34 and will be playing one year in sept Still do not have a character over 36 I still have not chose a main I have 32 characters on 11 servers including
ygData.messageBody:
I am 34 and will be playing one year in sept
Still do not have a character over 36
I still have not chose a main
I have 32 characters on 11 servers
including stormhammer
am I addicted???
maybe :p

>

>
> Keep going.........
